name: Deity (Dziek)
description:
You exist among the stars.

You have the power to create and alter objects.

Use this power to guide rocket ships safely through space so they can complete their mission.

---

Mouse Controls:

Left Click - Create / Move Objects

Right Click - Change Object's Mass

Middle Click - Destroy Object

Scroll - Change Object's Size

Keyboard Shortcuts:

Space - Launch / Reset

'Q' - Zoom In / Out

'E' - Open / Close Object Menu

Esc - Go Back a Menu

---

This game was created in about four weeks as part of a Game a Month challenge (profile here) by me (Dziek Dyes-Bolt) and my good friend James 'Chuggs' Charlesworth. I mainly did programming and design, whilst Chuggs did the art and level design.

We plan to update this semi-regularly, so if anyone has any feedback let me know on Twitter @DziekDB or via giant birds or whatever.
